import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; function Otp1() { const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); const changePhone = e=>{ setPhone(e.target.value) } const sendCode = e=>{ if (phone.length == 11){ axios.post("https://hi-exchange.com/v2/token/otp/", { mobile: phone }) } } const ConditionalLink = ({ children, to, condition }) => (!!condition && to) ? {children} : <>{children}; return ( <>
